text: Rafn, the son of Oflati, wields his axe the size of a stump as if it was a mere twig. His power a testiment of Baersonling strength.
The fiercest of Baersonling warriors are chosen to bear unique tokens crafted from a mixture of rock and steel.
Rafn's obsession with the tribeswoman Asta has both to do with her looks and the way she prepares large portions of meat.
Jarl Oflati was one of the strongest warriors produced by the Village Vinnskor, his axe a testiment of his legacy.
Rafn's Belt alone weighs more than the average empiric male, yet to him it is nothing but extra support and armour.
Pauldrons the size of the average head protect Rafn's strong and humongous shoulders.
Not as strong as the Steelfist, yet Rafn's name as the Ironfist has marked his name among Baersonling lore.
